Related repos

  • Guides and code examples for building AI applications
  • central hub for managing AI tools, prompts, and resources with Model Context Protocol
  • Semantic code search index for AI agents
  • catalog of Microsoft Model Context Protocol servers for AI apps
  • advanced Model Context Protocol tools for connecting AI to files, databases, GitHub, and web resources
  • TypeScript library and utilities for connecting to remote Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers
  • universal memory server for sharing context across all your AI apps
  • Google search and webpage analysis server for AI, MCP compatible
  • server for People Also Ask API, helps AI tools get question data for SEO
